rounds.response:
My position: Big Blind facing 20-chip bet holding K♠ 5♦ off-suit.

Decision points:
- Pot odds: Currently risk 20 chips to win 30 → 60 % break-even.
- Hand strength: King-high hand, off-suit, no connectedness. Behind most open-raising ranges.
- Opponent trend: Aggressive so far; three-barreled me on Hand 1 and stole on Hand 2.
- Stack pressure: Behind 1,040 vs 930; preserving chips is more valuable than marginal pots.

There’s no reason to commit chips now; folding keeps me at 930 and avoids bleeding more vs. an opponent who’s had the momentum.

[Fold]
